meanings.sent1: The intercolonial trade agreement benefited all the colonies involved.
meanings.sent2: The intercolonial highway connected the neighboring colonies for easier travel.
meanings.sent3: The intercolonial picnic brought together people from different colonies for a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The intercolonial friendships formed during the conference will strengthen diplomatic ties.
meanings.sent5: The intercolonial rivalry for resources sometimes led to conflicts.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving multiple colonies.
meanings.sent1: The intercolonial council discussed issues affecting all the colonies.
meanings.sent2: The intercolonial trade routes were crucial for the economic growth of the region.
meanings.sent3: The intercolonial sports competition showcased the talents of athletes from various colonies.
meanings.sent4: The intercolonial cultural exchange program promoted understanding among different colonies.
meanings.sent5: The intercolonial alliance was formed to address common security concerns.
